#summary infoList.
#labels free,cms,freecms,freeteam,开源,免费,内容管理系统,infoList

= infoList=
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">根据参数提取信息对象列表。</span></p>
<p>
	 </p>

<table>
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					参数</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					说明</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					siteid</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					信息所属站点id</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					channelid</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					信息所属栏目id</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					channelParid</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					从FreeCMS 1.3 开始支持</p>
				<p>
					栏目parid</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					num</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					提取数量</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					order</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					排序类型  </p>
				<p>
					1 固顶有效并降序,发布时间降序(默认)</p>
				<p>
					2 固顶有效并降序,发布时间升序</p>
				<p>
					3 发布时间降序</p>
				<p>
					4 发布时间升序</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					titleLen</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					标题显示长度</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					hot</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					是否按点击热度倒序，1是</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					dateFormat</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					日期格式</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					channelPagemark</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					栏目页面标识</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					channelParPagemark</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					从FreeCMS 1.3 开始支持</p>
				<p>
					父栏目页面标识</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					img</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					是否只提取带图片的新闻 1是</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					checkOpenendtime</p>
			</td>
			<td valign="top">
				<p>
					从FreeCMS 1.3 开始支持</p>
				<p>
					检查公开时限 默认不检查，1检查</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="border-collapse: collapse">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>
				<p>
					<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">返回值</span></b></p>
			</td>
			<td>
				<p>
					<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">说明</span></b></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>
				<p>
					<span style="font-family: 宋体">info</span></p>
			</td>
			<td>
				<p>
					<span style="font-family: 宋体">信息对象，类型为数据对象<span>info</span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>
				<p>
					<span style="font-family: 宋体">index</span></p>
			</td>
			<td>
				<p>
					<span style="font-family: 宋体">索引</span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">示例<span>1</span></span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">根据站点<span>id</span>和栏目<span>id</span>提取信息。</span></p>
<p>
{{{

<@infoList siteid="${site.id}" channelid="6555dd8b-7acc-4e57-a19a-cc70dd4f7135" num="2" titleLen="15"; info>
   <H1 > <a href="${info.pageurl}" target="_blank">${info.showtitle}</a></H1>
</@infoList>

}}}
</p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1230/194341_pKRG_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1230/194341_pKRG_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">示例<span>2</span></span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">根据站点<span>id</span>和栏目页面标识提取信息。</span></p>
<p>
{{{
<@infoList siteid="${site.id}" channelPagemark="动态" num="2" titleLen="15"; info,index>
   <H1 > ${index+1} . <a href="${info.pageurl}" target="_blank">${info.showtitle}</a></H1>
</@infoList>


}}}
</p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1230/194406_0t94_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1230/194406_0t94_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">示例<span>3</span></span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">根据站点<span>id</span>和栏目页面标识提取图片信息。</span></p>
<p>
{{{
<@infoList siteid="${site.id}" channelPagemark="动态" num="2" titleLen="15" img="1"; info,index>
   <li > <a href="${info.pageurl}" target="_blank"><img src="${info.img}">${info.showtitle}</a></li>
</@infoList>

}}}
</p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1230/194432_thhA_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1230/194432_thhA_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">示例<span>4</span></span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">根据站点<span>id</span>和栏目页面标识提取信息，并设置其它参数。</span></p>
<p>
{{{
<@infoList siteid="${site.id}" channelPagemark="动态" num="2" titleLen="15" order="2" hot="1" dateFormat="yyyy-MM-dd"; info,index>
   <li> ${index+1} . <a href="${info.pageurl}" target="_blank">${info.showtitle}</a>[${info.addtimeStr}]</li>
</@infoList>

}}}
</p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1230/194459_B03E_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1230/194459_B03E_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
